# Creator Tool Hub

> Creator Tool Hub is an AI workspace for YouTube creators to produce thumbnails, titles, descriptions, and timestamps that rank on YouTube.

Creator Tool Hub blends creative tooling with SEO automation for YouTube teams. Each workflow runs in the browser and can be explored for free; credits are consumed only when you request new AI generations.

## Core workflows

- [Homepage](https://creatortoolhub.com/): High-level overview, feature tour, and entry points into every AI workflow.
- [Thumbnail generator](https://creatortoolhub.com/thumbnails): Frame capture, template selection, AI refinements, and export guidance for 1280x720 YouTube-ready thumbnails.
- [Video SEO suite](https://creatortoolhub.com/video-seo): Generates titles, descriptions, hashtags, and MM:SS timestamps from public YouTube transcripts.

## Account & plans

- [Pricing and credits](https://creatortoolhub.com/pricing): Explains the credit system, plan tiers, and billing FAQs.

## Development

- [Creator Tool Hub repository](https://github.com/aj47/CreatorToolHub): Next.js source code, API routes, and UI components powering the workspace.
- [Issue tracker](https://github.com/aj47/CreatorToolHub/issues): Feature requests, bug reports, and roadmap discussions.
